item.description:
(860) 644-7702

346 Kelly Rd, Vernon Rockville, CT
Get Directions
www.angellinos.com...
Share in the traditional celebration of bountiful food and drink began by our Nonna Angellina. As Nonna would say " a full stomach softens the heart, renews the spirit, and strengthens the bonds of friendship". Eat Well and Prosper.

Welcome to Angellino's! Our Commitment is to provide authentic regional Italian cuisine at a value to our guests. We take pride in using only poultry, meats and seafood chosen by the highest standards. To support local growers and guarantee freshness, we purchase all of our vegetables, fruits and herbs from the local farmers market, and our pasta is made with 100% pure Italian durum Semolina. Everything at Angellino's is prepared with the health and well being of your family in mind. Thank you for joining us. And remember, your complete satisfaction is our number one goal. Buon Appetito!

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Angelinos
